com.facebook.buck.rules

Class AbstractDependencyVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractDependencyVisitor

  • public abstract class AbstractDependencyVisitor
extends Object
    Performs a breadth-first traversal of a BuildRule's dependencies.

      • visit

        public abstract ImmutableSet<BuildRule> visit(BuildRule rule)
        To perform a full traversal of the rule's transitive dependencies, this rule should return rule.getDeps().
        Parameters:
        rule - Visited build rule
        Returns:
        The set of children to visit after visiting this node. This set must be a subset of rule.getDeps()
